segments.text: I'm going to try sky diving this weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wouldn't do it if I were you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to try something exciting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's an easy way to get hurt , let me tell you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll tell you all about it next Monday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , take care of yourself , and don't say I didn't warn you .
segments.speaker: S2
